savedSearchesDescription: Updates on homes matching your saved searches.
savedHomesDescription: Updates for properties on your Saved homes list.
homeLoanDescription: Personalized mortgage info and offers that may be available for you.
newSettingDescription: Real estate tips, Zillow guides, and offbeat news for buyers, renters, sellers, and homeowners.
homeRecommendationsDescription: Property recommendations based on your Zillow activity.
rentalManagerNotificationsDescription: Updates and reminders about your rental property listings, renter applications, leases, and payments.
notificationOn: Get notifications from Zillow so you can stay on top of your journey to home. Turn them off any time you’d like.
notificationOff: You’ve turned off all notifications from Zillow. You can turn them back on at any time.
homeReportsDescription: Details on your homes Zestimate, the real estate market in your area, and more.
